description: A maple and lemon glaze adds zing and a hint of sweetness to this chicken recipe. Serve it up at your next dinner with creamy mash and crunchy broccoli.
name: Sticky Maple & Lemon Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat milk and spread in a small saucepan over low heat until almost boiling. Pour milk mixture over potato and stir to combine. Divide mash among plates. Top with chicken, lemon slices and broccolini. Spoon over sauce from tray. Scatter over parsley and season with pepper. Serve.
